title: Antemo - anyone know this font?
content:
Perhaps I’m having a duh moment as this font looks so identifiable…but i’m having a mind meltdown I guess!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |

author: joesomebody

comments.content: [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127122139/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.107984.0.3&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=antemo&sampleSize=24&attributes.paraSize=14&paraSize=14) or one of the thirty fonts influenced by it.
Looks like Myriad as well, but not exactly.
